title: Now a NEW problem with Outlook Live Mail :-(.
content:
Earlier I posted a couple new problems with Microsoft Outlook Live Mail regarding email attachments no longer opening and sudden odd behavior there a new sub window opens at the bottom of the page while I'm composing an email message and leaves me with my inbox. As of yesterday evening, Outlook no longer functions AT ALL, displaying the massage "Something went wrong..." (see screenshot). Not of these issues happen with Chrome. What gives??

I have been using Firefox exclusively for the past 5 years and never experienced issues with Outlook Live Mail.
creator: robs10

title: Hi - am now encountering IRRESOLVABLE difficulties DOWNLOADING files after Firefox would just NOT close not matter what I did.....
content:
(SECOND occurrence of this problem; not sure HOW previous instance resolved - my short-term memory ISN'T the best at present!)

Have taken all recommended steps short of completely refreshing (renamed a file titled 'config.json.old' as it was the ONLY one with a 'json' filepath suffix) because I don't want to have to relocate (another) existing session / configured profile by trial & error if avoidable - 'cookies' were removed along with history / cache cleared; reset / deleted related browser registry entries as directed, activated ' Troubleshooting / Safe Mode' contingency and STILL can't download anything (additionally, tried to do so with and without limited-time Malwarebytes web protections).....want to CONTINUE using Version 95 because by ALL indications and from what I'm seeing in Comments, my instincts about newer ones - were sound, WELL-informed.....please advise ASAP? Thanks!

content:
Hi guys! I have a question.

After a clean system reinstall today, my firefox can't play videos on specific websites (I'm from hungary, so some sites may be strange for you guys), for example facebook (Sorry we're having trouble playing this video), coub (just buffering), indavideo, vimea (xml_004 error), dailymotion (browser not compatible). All of this sites are working properly on edge.

I read some fixes, tried all of it (disable hardvare acc. and extensions, etc.). I had once a similar problem, then deleting the cert9 file solved it, but now it is not.

If anyone has an idea or asks for more information, write under this post.
creator: haraszti.pal1994

title: HTML Canvas measure text width difference
content:
HTML Canvas measure text width value is different from other browsers for Courier New font family.

Please find the width value comparison of the browsers. Google Chrome width: 19.203125 Firefox width: 20 Internet Explorer: 19 Edge: 19.203125

Sample Code: <canvas id="myCanvas" width="300" height="150" style="border:1px solid #d3d3d3;"></canvas> <script> var c = document.getElementById("myCanvas"); var ctx = c.getContext("2d"); ctx.font = "8px courier new"; var txt = "Code" ctx.fillText("width:" + ctx.measureText(txt).width, 10, 50); ctx.fillText(txt, 10, 100); </script>

title: Logo workspace google
content:
Buongiorno a tutti, ho installato l'ultima versione di firefox (95.0.2) su windows 10, ma quando accedo alla pagina di gmail il logo aziendale non viene caricato.

Ci tengo a specificare che:

  • Succede solo con questo browser. Installando Chrome il logo viene visualizzato correttamente
  • Succede solo con questo laptop. Usando Firefox 95.0.2 su un altro computer il logo viene correttamente caricato
  • Succede anche in modalità "incognita"

Visti questi due aspetti credo proprio sia un dettaglio legato al browser corrente

Qualche idea o suggerimento?
creator: luca.lombardi1986

title: google not loading after connecting to VPN network
content:
google.com and google related websites doesn't load at all. For example, gmail slowly loads, but loading icon never disappears, loading icon is always shown and then often it shows 'reconnecting' message. This works OK in Chrome.

Steps to reproduce: 1. Open Firefox without VPN - all loads well. 2. Enable VPN - stops loading. If I then disable VPN - it starts loading again.

If I restart Firefox it starts working OK, but after a while stops working again.
creator: kantix

title: How do you lock the font size in PowerPoint?
content: To prevent PowerPoint from resizing text, you can deactivate the text AutoFit feature by changing the PowerPoint Proofing options. Click the “File” tab on the PowerPoint menu ribbon. Click “Options” in the Help section. Click “Proofing” in the PowerPoint Options dialog box, and then click “AutoCorrect Options.” Fonts Bee
creator: emmabenjamin887

title: How do you change the text editor font?
content: Change the default font Select gedit ▸ Preferences ▸ Font & Colors. Uncheck the box next to the phrase, “Use the system fixed-width font.” Click on the current font name. … After you have chosen a new font, use the slider under the list of fonts to set the default font size. Click Select, and then click Close. Ezzee Fonts
creator: stellaelliott337

title: Unable to sync firefox bookmarks and saved logins from my previous mac device
content:
Hi Everyone - I was using firefox on my previous macbook pro and I shifted to a new macbook pro. On my older device I had logged in to the firefox and I was expecting my bookmark and saved login data to be backed up. Since I had to stop using that device, I logged out of my firefox account, and deleted everything on that device. I do not have any access to the older device.

Recently I started using the new device and logged into firefox using the same login on the new device. I cannot see any of my bookmarks and saved logins from my previous device getting synced to the new device.

How can this be resolved?

title: Getting Error: Request failed with status code 404 , attempting to access a route on my dev server
content:
I have no problem using Chrome , Brave browser to access pages on my dev server. My front end (React) is on localhost 3000, server is localhost 3001. This used to work, just two weeks ago. I'm on FF v95.0.2.

I've tried everything, headers in my index.html, cleared cookies and cache, various network settings, ran it in troubleshooting mode, restarted FF. I have all cors request enable on the server.

Anything I might be missing ?

edit: Found my mistake, had another app opened on the same port , apologies.
